Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $120, but considering your interest, I propose a special introductory price of $140. This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece that offers great value and satisfaction. Let me know if you're interested! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
